name: salesbook
description: Multi-tenant lead generation and CRM platform

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.db:migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:prod: cd server && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd server && npx prisma migrate reset
